versions.title: Add Classic Layout Setting & Ability to Minimize Export Modal during export

changes.description: Added ability to switch between Classic and Modern layout styles
Added ability to minimize export modal during export and see progress on a floating notification
Added a new diagnostics button to the settings modal that will generate a shareable id to share with the Sentry Six team for debugging purposes.

versions.title: Prevents modal from closing during update

changes.description: Prevents the update modal from closing during an update if the user attempts to close it.
Fixed changelogs not loading properly. Updated to grab changelog from github repo instead of locally due to inital testing..
Improved video export marker UX and layout
Fixed rare issue of export cancellation not working properly
Improved GPU encoding & added HEVC encoder detection
Significantly reduced export time when Dashboard Overlay is enabled
Added ability for Maximum Quality export to be done with GPU if HEVC is available
Overhaul of Settings & Export UI to improve tidiness and match the design language between the modals
New version-based update system with semantic versioning
